Package gw.solr.request

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDeleteRequest
    Represents a Solr update request that will delete one or more records. Can specify records by id (most efficient) or by query. If using query form, ensure query precisely defines exactly which records should be removed, no more, no less, as every record matched will be deleted. No fuzzy queries!
    AbstractIndexDocument
    Represents a Solr document (or the key thereof). A row in a Solr index, if you will.
    AbstractIndexRequest
    Represents a Solr update request that will add or modify one of more records.
    AbstractRequest
    AbstractSearchRequest<E extends Object>
    DataHolderImpl
    DataHolderPath
    Incremental parsing of solr-search-config path format which has one of these forms root.Property1.Property2.LeafPropertyName root.(Property1 as type.qualifier).(Property2 as other.type).LeafPropertyName where '"type qualifier", if present, is the a type the bean at this level must be convertable to or the field will be ignored. If this format gets any more complicated, use a regex or small state machine for parsing
    FilterOperation
    IMessageRequest
    Interface implemented by any Solr request instance that deals with the message queue.
    ISolrQueryElement
    ResultHolderImpl
    SolrQueryFilter
    SolrQueryTerm
